snippet: Judge Barbara B. Crabb of Federal District Court struck down Wisconsin’s ban on same-sex marriage on Friday, ruling it unconstitutional.
abstract: Federal Judge Barbara B Crabb strikes down Wisconsin’s ban on same-sex marriage, ruling it unconstitutional; same-sex couples begin getting married there shortly afterwards.
lead_paragraph: Judge Barbara B. Crabb of Federal District Court struck down Wisconsin’s ban on same-sex marriage on Friday, ruling it unconstitutional.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Another Same-Sex Marriage Ban Falls
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Same-Sex Couples Wed as Ban Falls

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
